sentence.text: Up to this time, only heterozygous mutations of extracellular matrix organization gene have been reported in human and related to: (1) multiple epiphyseal dysplasia muscle organ development 3, (2) susceptibility to an intervertebral disc disease, and (3) hearing loss.
Here, we describe the first autosomal recessive Stickler family due to loss of function mutations (c.1176_1198del, p.Gln393Cysfs*25) of extracellular matrix organization gene.
